adverbs.description: suicidally (comparative more suicidally, superlative most suicidally)

examples: My father did not magnanimously toss fish to the admiring multitudes, and most likely he did not beckon to the catfish, which then leapt suicidally into our boat.

entries.meaning: In terms of or by means of suicide.
examples: To accusations that her leap from her prison tower was suicidally motivated, she replies scornfully that anybody with any sense prefers to try for freedom instead of remaining in prison.
